mapper.select: SELECT count( * ) FROM ( SELECT iu.id FROM iam_user iu WHERE iu.organization_id = #{tenantId} and iu.is_enabled = 1 UNION SELECT DISTINCT imr.member_id FROM iam_member_role imr JOIN iam_user iu1 ON imr.member_id = iu1.id AND iu1.is_enabled = 1 WHERE imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.source_id = #{tenantId} AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id NOT IN ( SELECT id FROM iam_user iu WHERE iu.organization_id = #{tenantId} ) ) temp

SELECT org.*, CASE WHEN t.project_count IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE t.project_count END AS projectCount FROM hpfm_tenant org LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.organization_id AS org_id, COUNT(p.id) AS project_count FROM hpfm_tenant o JOIN fd_project p ON o.tenant_id = p.organization_id GROUP BY p.organization_id ) t ON org.tenant_id = t.org_id
LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_config htc ON htc.tenant_id = org.tenant_id AND htc.config_key = 'homePage'
LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_config owner ON owner.tenant_id = org.tenant_id AND owner.config_key = 'userId' LEFT JOIN iam_user iu ON owner.config_value = iu.id
LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_tl htt on htt.tenant_id = org.tenant_id and htt.lang= #{lang}
LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_config register ON register.tenant_id = org.tenant_id AND register.config_key = 'isRegister'
AND htt.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
AND org.tenant_num LIKE concat(concat('%',#{code}),'%')
AND org.enabled_flag = #{enabled}
AND htc.config_value LIKE concat(concat('%', #{homePage}), '%')
AND iu.real_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{ownerRealName}), '%')
AND ( htt.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR org.tenant_num LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )
AND register.config_value LIKE concat(concat('%', #{isRegister}), '%')

select distinct fo.* from hpfm_tenant fo inner join iam_member_role imr on (fo.tenant_id = imr.source_id and imr.source_type = 'organization') inner join iam_role ir on (ir.id = imr.role_id and ir.is_enabled = 1)
imr.member_id = #{memberId} and imr.member_type='user' and ir.code != 'role/organization/default/organization-member'
AND fo.enabled_flag = 1

SELECT o.tenant_id, htt.tenant_name, o.tenant_num, o.enabled_flag, ir.id AS role_id, ir.name AS role_name, ir.code AS role_code, ir.is_enabled AS role_is_enabled FROM hpfm_tenant o INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT source_id FROM iam_member_role WHERE member_id = #{id} AND member_type = 'user' AND source_type = 'organization' ORDER BY source_id ASC LIMIT #{start}, #{size} ) t ON o.tenant_id = t.source_id INNER JOIN iam_member_role imr ON imr.source_id = o.tenant_id LEFT JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_tl htt on htt.tenant_id = o.tenant_id and htt.lang= #{lang} WHERE imr.source_type = 'organization' AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{id}
AND ( htt.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR o.tenant_num LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )
SELECT enabled_flag FROM hpfm_tenant WHERE tenant_id = #{sourceId}

SELECT fo.tenant_id AS id, htt.tenant_name AS `name`, fo.tenant_num AS `code`, fo.enabled_flag AS enabled FROM hpfm_tenant fo LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_tl htt on htt.tenant_id = fo.tenant_id and htt.lang= #{lang} WHERE 1 = 1
AND htt.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{name}), '%')
AND fo.tenant_num LIKE concat(concat('%', #{code}), '%')
AND fo.enabled_flag = #{enabled}
AND ( htt.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') OR fo.tenant_num LIKE concat(concat('%', #{params}), '%') )
AND fo.tenant_id IN
#{item}
SELECT fo.* FROM hpfm_tenant fo left join iam_user iu on fo.tenant_id = iu.organization_id where iu.id = #{userId}
SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN fp.is_enabled=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS enableSum, SUM(CASE WHEN fp.is_enabled=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS stopSum FROM fd_project fp WHERE fp.organization_id=#{organizationId}

select fo.tenant_id from hpfm_tenant fo LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_tl htt on htt.tenant_id = fo.tenant_id and htt.lang= #{lang} WHERE 1=1
AND htt.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
SELECT ht.tenant_id AS id, ht.tenant_name AS `name` FROM hpfm_tenant ht

SELECT ht.tenant_id, ht.tenant_num, ht.enabled_flag, ht.object_version_number, ht.created_by, ht.last_updated_by, ht.last_update_date, ht.creation_date, ht.limit_user_qty, htt.tenant_name FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN hpfm_tenant ht ON ht.tenant_id = imr.source_id LEFT JOIN hpfm_tenant_tl htt on htt.tenant_id = ht.tenant_id and htt.lang= #{lang}
ht.enabled_flag = true AND imr.member_type = 'user' AND imr.member_id = #{params.userId} AND imr.source_type = 'organization'
AND htt.tenant_name LIKE concat(concat('%', #{param1.tenantName}), '%')
AND ht.tenant_num LIKE concat(concat('%', #{param1.tenantNum}), '%')
